Title: Golar delays delivery of Gimi FLNG for Greater Tortue Ahmeyim project to 3Q 2023
Description: LNG midstream infrastructure firm Golar LNG has pushed back the delivery timing of its Gimi floating LNG vessel for BPâ€™s 2.4 mtpa Greater Tortue Ahmeyim project in Senegal and Mauritania from the first half of this year to the third quarter, potentially delaying the start of LNG production at the floating plant.
Author: CK
